snippet.title: Streets of Rogue 2 - Release Date Trailer (feat. Perturbator) | PC Gaming Show 2024
snippet.description:
Watch the new gameplay trailer for Streets of Rogue 2, an over-the-top open-world sandbox RPG in which players will have to topple a corrupt president by any means necessary. An ambitious sequel to a 2019 indie darling, Streets of Rogue 2 creatively mixes the most fun mechanics of the roguelike, open-world RPG, sandbox, and immersive sim games, and is coming to Steam Early Access on August 14, 2024.

#IGN #Gaming
